name: Defiance 2050 - Engineer Class Pack
detailed_description:
Get ready to manufacture some pain! The Engineer Class has come to Defiance 2050!

INCLUDES
  • Engineer Class
  • Engineer Outfit
  • “Engineer” Title
about_the_game:
Get ready to manufacture some pain! The Engineer Class has come to Defiance 2050!

INCLUDES
  • Engineer Class
  • Engineer Outfit
  • “Engineer” Title
short_description: Get ready to manufacture some pain! The Engineer Class has come to Defiance 2050!
supported_languages:
English*, French*, German*
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 or newer
  • Processor: Dual Core 2.0 GHz or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 650, ATI/AMD Radeon 7770 or better.
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 17 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Glyph Client and registered Trion Worlds Account
